title: Website Starter — Basic
description: A fast, responsive 5-page brochure website built with modern React and Tailwind. Includes basic SEO, mobile optimization, contact form, and deployment guidance delivered as a deployable static site.

title: Website Pro — E-commerce Ready
description: Professional website with product pages, shopping cart setup, payment integrations, performance optimizations, and analytics. Designed for stores and businesses ready to sell online with a modern frontend and product feed.

title: SEO Audit — Essentials
description: Technical SEO audit covering Core Web Vitals, indexability, and on-page recommendations with a practical 10-point action plan and prioritized fixes to improve organic performance.

title: SEO Growth Package
description: Monthly SEO program including keyword intelligence, on-page optimization, content guidance, backlog prioritization, and monthly reporting to sustainably grow organic traffic.

title: Cybersecurity Audit — Essentials
description: Comprehensive external security audit that includes network surface scanning, web app analysis, configuration review, and prioritized remediation steps to harden infrastructure.

title: IT Support — Monthly
description: Managed remote IT support for small teams including a monthly allowance of support hours, patching guidance, monitoring and priority response to incidents.

title: Software Optimization License
description: License for a browser-based optimization tool that automates performance tuning checks and provides actionable presets for speed and accessibility.

title: Training: Python Basics (Group)
description: Two-hour live workshop introducing Python fundamentals, practical examples and best practices for beginners and professionals upskilling in automation.

title: IMEI Service — Device Unlock
description: Permanent IMEI-based network unlock for many Android and iPhone models. Orders include an IMEI verification step and a secure tracking ID for the request.

title: Network Unlock — Carrier Solutions
description: Carrier-level network unlock and provisioning support for region-locked devices and carrier-locked phones — handled with compliance and carrier workflows.

title: Android Tools Suite — Utilities
description: Collection of Android utilities: automated backups, debugging helpers, ADB scripts, and optimization presets to streamline device maintenance and testing.

title: iPhone Toolkit — Mac & Windows
description: Toolkit for iPhone management, provisioning, diagnostics and provisioning profiles with step-by-step guides for technicians and developers.

title: Antivirus — Cloud License (1 Year)
description: Cloud-powered antivirus license providing real-time protection, cloud scanning, threat intelligence updates, and centralized dashboard for small teams.

title: Cloud Backup — 1TB (1 Year)
description: Secure encrypted cloud backups for files and device snapshots with versioning, restore tools and enterprise-grade encryption at rest and transit.

title: License Key — Premium Tool
description: One-year license key for premium developer and IT tools with priority support and commercial use permissions.

title: DevOps Security Audit
description: Infrastructure and pipeline review focused on secrets, CI/CD security, container hardening and deployment best practices to reduce blast radius.

title: Kubernetes Hardening Guide
description: Consulting guide for secure Kubernetes patterns, RBAC, network policies, and operational runbooks to ensure resilient clusters.

title: Threat Intelligence — Monthly Feed
description: Actionable threat intelligence feed with IOCs, trending campaign reports and prioritized alerts for your environment. Includes CSV and API-ready feeds.

title: Penetration Test — Essentials
description: Ethical penetration testing for web applications and APIs with authenticated test coverage, exploit validation, and remediation guidance.

title: Accessibility Audit — WCAG
description: Accessibility review with WCAG 2.1 recommendations, implementation guidance and prioritized fixes to improve inclusivity and compliance.

title: Cloud Migration — Assessment
description: Assessment for cloud migration readiness, cost modelling, target architecture and migration plan for small to medium workloads.

title: Advanced Security Training — Team
description: Multi-day hands-on security training for developers and infra teams covering secure coding, threat modelling, and incident response playbooks.

title: Endpoint Protection — Pro
description: Endpoint protection agent with behavioral detection, cloud analytics, and centralized policy for small and medium businesses.

title: SSO Integration — Enterprise
description: Design and implement Single Sign-On integration using SAML/OIDC with role mapping, session policies and audit logging for compliance.

title: Backup Plan — 1TB Encrypted
description: Encrypted 1TB cloud backup with versioning, restore SLA and admin controls for small businesses that require reliable recovery options.

title: Mobile Device Management — Starter
description: Cloud-based mobile device management with policy controls, app provisioning and remote wipe for company-issued devices.

title: UX Audit — Conversion Focus
description: Conversion-focused UX audit with session analysis, heuristic review, and prioritized A/B test ideas to increase user conversion.

title: Enterprise License — Annual
description: Annual enterprise license bundle for our premium suite of tools including priority support, analytics and deployment recipes.

title: SEO Enterprise Program
description: Full-scale enterprise SEO program combining technical operations, content strategy, backlink acquisition, and executive reporting.

title: Incident Response — Rapid Pack
description: Rapid incident response retainer with triage playbooks, forensic support, and hands-on remediation to contain and recover from active breaches.
